name: Angry Chickens
description:
My first ever Game Jam submission! 

Team Name 

4fun

Gameplay Instructions 

WASD and mouse for movement and aiming, LMB for shooting, Space for jumping, press Esc to quit the game 

Content that was created before the jam that was included in the final submission

  • All 3d models are free assets taken from https://opengameart.org/, https://free3d.com/, and other resources  
  • Architecture and particles are taken from the UE4 starter pack 
  • Music:  "Hunting the Cockroach" by Russ Makiwicz
  • Sounds are from the Soundly library
